mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS task_id, t.status_task AS task_status_task, t.title AS task_title, t.user_id AS task_user_id, t.created_date AS task_created_date, t.start_date AS task_start_date, t.close_date AS task_close_date, t.priority AS task_priority, t.progress AS task_progress, t.status AS task_status, t.content AS task_content, u.id AS user_id, u.fullname AS user_fullname, u.avatar AS user_avatar FROM task t INNER JOIN user u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE t.status = #{status} AND ( u.fullname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR t.content LIKE CONCAT('%#', #{search}, '%') OR t.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ) LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET title = #{title}, status_task = #{statusTask}, priority = #{priority}, content = #{content}, progress = #{progress}, start_date = #{startDate} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT status_task, COUNT(*) as taskCount FROM task GROUP BY status_task

SELECT t.id AS task_id, t.status_task AS task_status_task, t.title AS task_title, t.user_id AS task_user_id, t.created_date AS task_created_date, t.start_date AS task_start_date, t.close_date AS task_close_date, t.priority AS task_priority, t.progress AS task_progress, t.status AS task_status, t.content AS task_content, c.id AS comment_id, c.user_id AS comment_user_id, c.content AS comment_content, c.files AS comment_files, c.parent_id AS comment_parent_id, c.created_date AS comment_created_date, c.modified_date AS comment_modified_date, c.modified_by AS comment_modified_by, u.id AS user_id, u.fullname AS user_fullname, u.avatar AS user_avatar FROM task t LEFT JOIN comment_task c ON t.id = c.task_id AND c.parent_id IS NULL LEFT JOIN user u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id AS comment_id, c.user_id AS comment_user_id, c.content AS comment_content, c.files AS comment_files, c.created_date AS comment_created_date, c.parent_id AS comment_parent_id, c.created_date AS comment_created_date, c.modified_date AS comment_modified_date, c.modified_by AS comment_modified_by, u.fullname AS user_fullname, u.avatar AS user_avatar FROM comment_task c INNER JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.parent_id = #{id}
SELECT u.id AS comment_user_id, u.fullname AS user_fullname, u.avatar AS user_avatar FROM user u WHERE u.id = #{id}
